attributes.action: Promote Britishness across our green and pleasant land above all radical beliefs
attributes.additional_details:
Let's not leave our own culture behind in a bid to appease other cultures 
Britain must be British and Christian first and foremost.
Put the British people and our culture first !
If we don't act now, Britain will loose what once made us Great Britain
attributes.background:
Britain is quickly loosing its long established religious heritage and beliefs to the many forms of oppressive radicalisation. 
Britishness needs to be promoted now in order to maintain and rebuild the fair and sensible status quo within our country  therby building a secure future for our children

rejection.details: Petitions need to call for a specific action from the Government or Parliament.
